Package dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.parsers

Class Scorm12Parser

java.lang.Object
dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.parsers.BaseParser<Scorm12Metadata,Scorm12Manifest>
dev.jcputney.elearning.parser.parsers.Scorm12Parser
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModuleParser
public class Scorm12Parser extends BaseParser<Scorm12Metadata,Scorm12Manifest>
Parses SCORM 1.2 modules by reading the imsmanifest.xml file and extracting core metadata.

This parser extracts key information such as title, description, identifier, launch URL, version, and optional fields like mastery score and custom data, storing them in a standardized ModuleMetadata object.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public Scorm12Metadata parse(String modulePath) throws ModuleParsingException
      Parses the SCORM 1.2 module located at the specified modulePath. Extracts metadata, including title, description, identifier, launch URL, a default version string, and optional fields like mastery score and custom data.
      Specified by:
      parse in interface ModuleParser
      Specified by:
      parse in class BaseParser<Scorm12Metadata,Scorm12Manifest>
      Parameters:
      modulePath - The path to the module's root directory.
      Returns:
      A populated ModuleMetadata object containing the extracted metadata.
      Throws:
      ModuleParsingException - if an error occurs during parsing.

    • isSupported

      public boolean isSupported(String modulePath)
      Checks if this parser can handle the module located at the specified path by verifying the presence of imsmanifest.xml.

      SCORM 1.2 modules are identified by the presence of an imsmanifest.xml file in the root directory.

      Specified by:
      isSupported in interface ModuleParser
      Specified by:
      isSupported in class BaseParser<Scorm12Metadata,Scorm12Manifest>
      Parameters:
      modulePath - The path to the module's root directory.
      Returns:
      True if imsmanifest.xml is present; false otherwise.
